verses.verse: And the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> assembled together <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8735><s%> at Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>, and set up <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> there. And the land <S%H776><s%> was subdued <S%H3533><s%> <S%H8738><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

And there remained <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8735><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%>, which had not yet received <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, How long are ye slack <S%H7503><s%> <S%H8693><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you?

Give out <S%H3051><s%> <S%H8798><s%> from among you three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> for each tribe <S%H7626><s%>: and I will send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and they shall rise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8691><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%>, and describe <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it according <S%H6310><s%> to the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of them; and they shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> again to me.

And they shall divide <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8694><s%> it into seven <S%H7651><s%> parts <S%H2506><s%>: Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> shall abide <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in their coast <S%H1366><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%>, and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%> shall abide <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in their coasts <S%H1366><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%>.

Ye shall therefore describe <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into seven <S%H7651><s%> parts <S%H2506><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the description hither to me, that I may cast <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8804><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for you here before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

But the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> have no part <S%H2506><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you; for the Kohenhood <S%H3550><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> is their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: and Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, have received <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> on the east <S%H4217><s%>, which Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them.

And the men <S%H582><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went away <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> charged <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them that went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to describe <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8690><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%>, and describe <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8798><s%> it, and come again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to me, that I may here cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for you before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and passed through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, and described <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it by cities <S%H5892><s%> into seven <S%H7651><s%> parts <S%H2506><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> again to Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> to the host <S%H4264><s%> at Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for them in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: and there Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> divided <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> according to their divisions <S%H4256><s%>.

And the lot <S%H1486><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>: and the coast <S%H1366><s%> of their lot <S%H1486><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> between the children <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%>.

And their border <S%H1366><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> was from Yarden <S%H3383><s%>; and the border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Yericho <S%H3405><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side, and went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> through the mountains <S%H2022><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>; and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> thereof were at the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Bethaven <S%H1007><s%>.

And the border <S%H1366><s%> went over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from thence toward Luz <S%H3870><s%>, to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Luz <S%H3870><s%>, which is Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>, southward <S%H5045><s%>; and the border <S%H1366><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Atarothadar <S%H5853><s%>, near the hill <S%H2022><s%> that lieth on the south side <S%H5045><s%> of the nether <S%H8481><s%> Bethhoron <S%H1032><s%>.

And the border <S%H1366><s%> was drawn <S%H8388><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thence, and compassed <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8738><s%> the corner <S%H6285><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%>, from the hill <S%H2022><s%> that lieth before <S%H6440><s%> Bethhoron <S%H1032><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%>; and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> thereof were at Kirjathbaal <S%H7154><s%>, which is Kiryat-Ye`arim <S%H7157><s%>, a city <S%H5892><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>: this was the west <S%H3220><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%>.

And the south <S%H5045><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%> was from the end <S%H7097><s%> of Kiryat-Ye`arim <S%H7157><s%>, and the border <S%H1366><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%>, and went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the well <S%H4599><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> of Nephtoah <S%H5318><s%>:

And the border <S%H1366><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the end <S%H7097><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> that lieth before <S%H6440><s%> the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hinnom <S%H2011><s%>, and which is in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of the giants <S%H7497><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%>, and descended <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hinnom <S%H2011><s%>, to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Jebusi <S%H2983><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%>, and descended <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Enrogel <S%H5883><s%>,

And was drawn <S%H8388><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from the north <S%H6828><s%>, and went forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Enshemesh <S%H5885><s%>, and went forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> toward Geliloth <S%H1553><s%>, which is over against <S%H5227><s%> the going up <S%H4608><s%> of Adummim <S%H131><s%>, and descended <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the stone <S%H68><s%> of Bohan <S%H932><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>,

And passed along <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> toward the side <S%H3802><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Arabah <S%H6160><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>, and went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Arabah <S%H6160><s%>:

And the border <S%H1366><s%> passed along <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Bethhoglah <S%H1031><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>: and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> of the border <S%H1366><s%> were at the north <S%H6828><s%> bay <S%H3956><s%> of the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> at the south <S%H5045><s%> end <S%H7097><s%> of Yarden <S%H3383><s%>: this was the south <S%H5045><s%> coast <S%H1366><s%>.

And Yarden <S%H3383><s%> was the border <S%H1379><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of it on the east <S%H6924><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>. This was the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>, by the coasts <S%H1367><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>, according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

Now the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> were Yericho <S%H3405><s%>, and Bethhoglah <S%H1031><s%>, and the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Keziz <S%H7104><s%>,
And Betharabah <S%H1026><s%>, and Zemaraim <S%H6787><s%>, and Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>,
And Avim <S%H5761><s%>, and Parah <S%H6511><s%>, and Ophrah <S%H6084><s%>,
And Chepharhaammonai <S%H3726><s%>, and Ophni <S%H6078><s%>, and Gaba <S%H1387><s%>; twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:
Giv`on <S%H1391><s%>, and Ramah <S%H7414><s%>, and Beeroth <S%H881><s%>,
And Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%>, and Chephirah <S%H3716><s%>, and Mozah <S%H4681><s%>,
And Rekem <S%H7552><s%>, and Irpeel <S%H3416><s%>, and Taralah <S%H8634><s%>,

And Zelah <S%H6762><s%>, Eleph <S%H507><s%>, and Jebusi <S%H2983><s%>, which is Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, Gibeath <S%H1394><s%>, and Kirjath <S%H7157><s%>; fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>. This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.
